entry.title: BRC20 Token ORDI Dips 10% in a Week After a 319% Monthly Surge, Nears Record High
entry.summary:
The price of the BRC20 token ordi (ORDI) slid more than 10% this week against the U.S. dollar after recording substantial gains over the three weeks prior. Despite the recent downturn, ORDI has risen over 300% during the last 30 days and itâ€™s a touch over 25% away from surpassing its all-time price high.
ORDI Retreats 10% After 300% Monthly Gain, Sees Significant Trading Activity With Turkish Lira
At the end of the first week of November, ordi (ORDI) the BRC20 token built on top of the Bitcoin blockchain skyrocketed in value after Binance announced it would list the coin. This week, however, ORDI has dropped 10% in value over the past seven days and during the last 24 hours, itâ€™s down 2.2%.
ORDIâ€™s market valuation on November 25, 2023, is just under a half billion at $446 million. This places ORDI in the 115th-ranked position among more than 10,000 crypto assets listed across 935 exchanges. Over the past day, ORDI has recorded $99 million in global trades, and interestingly, statistics from cryptocompare.com show ORDI has a great deal of trades associated with the Turkish lira, and even more so than its USDT pairs.
While ORDI is down 2.2% and more than 10% this past week, it has climbed awfully close to the pinnacle price it hit seven months ago on May 08, 2023. At that time, ORDI was trading for $28.52 per coin, and today, it is exchanging hands for $21.04 per unit. Moreover, over the past 30 days, ORDI has climbed 319% against the greenback.
Wallet or rich list statistics from the top ten ORDI wallets indicate that the crypto exchange Okx is one of the largest holders. The centralized exchange has a vast sum of ORDI tokens in the following addresses â€œbc1q8,â€ â€œbc1qg,â€ â€œbc1qz,â€ â€œbc1qn,â€ and â€œbc1qq,â€ among others. The largest ORDI holder today is the wallet â€œbc1qhâ€ which commands 2,231,755 ORDI. The address is not flagged so the owner is unknown.
What do you think about ORDIâ€™s market performance? Share your thoughts and opinions about this subject in the comments section below.

entry.summary:

The lawsuit accuses Rinsch of misappropriating millions of dollars that were intended to fund the production of a science-fiction television series.

entry.title: Crypto Misfortune: European Central Bank Chiefâ€™s Son Hit By 60% Investment Loss
entry.summary:
According to a Reuters report, European Central Bank (ECB) President Christine Lagarde revealed that her son experienced substantial losses in his crypto investments, disregarding numerous warnings.Â
Lagarde, a vocal critic of cryptocurrencies, has expressed concerns about their speculative nature, lack of intrinsic value, and potential misuse by criminals for illicit activities.Â
ECB Chief Urges Need For Global Crypto Regulation
During a town hall event with students in Frankfurt, Germany, Lagarde revealed that her son, whose identity was not disclosed, lost â€œalmost allâ€ of his investments in crypto assets.Â
Lagarde stressed that he ignored her advice despite her warnings and suffered significant financial consequences. Lagarde revealed that her son lost about 60% of his invested â€¦

entry.title: ICO-Era Ethereum Whale Awakens After 3 Years, Transfers ETH To Kraken
entry.summary:
A dormant Ethereum (ETH) wallet containing thousands of coins collected during the networkâ€™s token generation event is awake after nearly three years.
According to LookonchainÂ data, on November 24, approximately $42.4 million worth of ETH was moved, with 10 ETH deposited directly to Kraken, a crypto exchange.Â
Ethereum Whale Awakens
On-chain data reveals the dormant wallet first collected 100,000 ETH during the 2014 Ethereum initial token offering (ICO) â€“ worth around $31,000.
Then, the coin was being issued for $0.31. Over the years, ETH prices have continued rallying, rising to all-time highs in 2021.
Notably, despite being among the earliest ETH holders, the whale last moved coins in 2020. Impressively, the address didnâ€™t even cash out throughout the 2021 bull run when priâ€¦

entry.title: Dacoco CEO Saro McKenna: How Alien Worlds is Creating an AI-Powered 'Lore DAO' with Kevin J Anderson
entry.summary: Decrypt joined Dacoco CEO Sarojini McKenna at Web Summit 2023 to talk about Alien Worlds' new Lore DAO and its AI-powered collaboration with sci-fi author Kevin J Anderson.

entry.title: Avalon's Jeffrey Butler on Designing a Metaverse MMO That Lets Players Co-Create
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson and details his studio's new MMO game with interoperable assetsâ€”and how it will enable players to create and monetize their own content.

entry.title: How Gen Z Is Different: OTK Chief Strategy Officer Talks Creator Economy Shift and Rise of Kick
entry.summary: One True King, an esports and gaming lifestyle brand and media company, was founded by creators like Asmongold and Mizkif. OTK's Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz, who previously worked at TikTok and Twitch, shares with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the creator economy is changing.

entry.title: MoisÃ©s Zamora on Videomart and Bucking the Hollywood System
entry.summary: "Selena: The Series" creator and co-showrunner MoisÃ©s Zamora joins Decrypt's Sander Lutz at the Film3 Summit 2023 to discuss why the Hollywood system is broken and why he founded the Videomart NFT digital film marketplace to give creators more power.

entry.title: Why OTK Is Making Video Games
entry.summary: One True King (OTK) Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about OTK's long-term strategy and vision to become a content creator-powered media and video games company.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: LoVid
entry.summary:
Artistic duo LoVid, aka Tali Hinkis and Kyle Lapidus, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about art, lettuce, and the hellscape (in someoneâ€™s opinion) that is Miami.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Barney on DeFi, Privacy, and Vega
entry.summary:
This week our host is joined by Barney the founder of Vega Protocol.
They discuss the current state of DeFi, what's wrong with the apps being built today, whether or not privacy matters when its only applied to an L2, and most importantly-- which form of sales tax is the sexiest.

entry.title: Why Is Phantom Galaxies Releasing Two Versions of Its Game?
entry.summary: Animoca Brands-owned Blowfish Studios is building a space mech pilot game called Phantom Galaxies. Blowfish Cofounder Ben Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his plans for the game's release.

entry.title: Sophie Maxx on NFTs, Augmented Reality, and Fashion
entry.summary: This week our host is joined by Sophie Maxx (Web3Maxx) to discuss NFTs, augmented reality, the metaverse, how blockchain is sneaking into the fashion world, and more!

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Kevin Rose
entry.summary:
Kevin Rose, co-founder and CEO of PROOF and co-creator of the hit Moonbirds NFT collection, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer some hard-hitting questions about his childhood dreams, his wifeâ€™s candy preferences, and his undying love of rap music.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: What Happened to Atari's Token? Inside Atari's Blockchain Plans
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Atari X director Tyler Drewitz about what happened with Atari's token plans, whether a token is coming, and what Atari games might be getting the blockchain treatment. Oh, and there's lots of Easter eggs.

entry.title: Twitch CEO Dan Clancy Is a 'Wild Card,' Says Marketing Director
entry.summary: Twitch Senior Director of Community Marketing Mary Kish speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Twitch CEO Dan Clancy, Ninja, Twitch's new simulcasting rules, the biggest differences between Twitch and rival platform Kick, and the role of esports on the streaming platform.

entry.title: Why NFT Paris has Launched a Loyalty Token
entry.summary: NFT Paris founder Alexandre Tsydenkov told Decrypt what to expect from the upcoming 2024 edition of the conference, the launch of its loyalty token and its plans to create a Web3 loyalty program that rewards the most engaged members of the community.

entry.title: Game Reviewâ€”Formula E: High Voltage Is a Fun Play-to-Earn Racer That Lacks Direction
entry.summary:
Formula E: High Voltage is a play-to-earn racing game with a distinctive strategic approach. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin put Animoca's web-based game through its paces in this review, highlighting the unique gameplay design, the role of NFTs and crypto, and where the game currently comes up short.
